channel.title: Huge Bug In Invision Power Board
channel.description:
Topic Title Change Bug 1) Make a topic 2) Edit it, make sure you can edit the title 3) Change the url, from the number of the thread you are editing to you want to edit. Eg : /index.php?act=Post&CODE=08&f=7&t=6229&p=12293507&st= To /index.php?act=Post&CODE=08&f=7&t=4532&p=12293507&st= 4) Press go 5) Edit the title only 6) It edits other topic title
Works on versions up to 2.1.6 not including 2.1.6 and also remains unpatched on invisionfree.
I have used this on several sites, most think you have hacked them and change forums (RuneHq) and some just think you are messing about (Rsc). I found this out a while back, and told a few of my friends but I think it's best if other people know now ;)
This guide was made by Mmmk, please credit me if you copy and paste on another forum and link to this thread.

item.title: Huge Bug In Invision Power Board
item.dc:creator: @Mmmk Mmmk
item.description:
@Mmmk wrote:

[quote=“Stoney22, post:1, topic:41155”]well im obviously screwing up somewhere

The error returned was:

You do not have permission to view this topic

Hosted for free by InvisionFree (Terms of Use: Updated 7/7/05) | Powered by Invision Power Board v1.3 Final © 2003 IPS, Inc.
Page creation time: 0.0074 seconds | Archive

well nice tut anyway :P[/quote]
You have to have permission to view the topic you want to edit Unless invisionfree fixed it.

Read full topic

item.title: Huge Bug In Invision Power Board
item.dc:creator: @Mmmk Mmmk
item.description:
@Mmmk wrote:

Topic Title Change Bug

  1. Make a topic
  2. Edit it, make sure you can edit the title
  3. Change the url, from the number of the thread you are editing to you want to edit.
    Eg : /index.php?act=Post&CODE=08&f=7&t=6229&p=12293507&st=
    To /index.php?act=Post&CODE=08&f=7&t=4532&p=12293507&st=
  4. Press go
  5. Edit the title only
  6. It edits other topic title

Works on versions up to 2.1.6 not including 2.1.6 and also remains unpatched on invisionfree.

I have used this on several sites, most think you have hacked them and change forums (RuneHq) and some just think you are messing about (Rsc). I found this out a while back, and told a few of my friends but I think it’s best if other people know now

This guide was made by Mmmk, please credit me if you copy and paste on another forum and link to this thread.
